name: Love
title: Every Biblical Greek & Hebrew Word for Love
description: Discover the profound nuances of Love in Scripture. Explore the differences between Agape (divine love), Phileo (brotherly love), and the Hebrew Hesed (steadfast loyalty).

name: Peace
title: The Full Meaning of Biblical Peace: Shalom & Eirēnē
description: Biblical peace is more than the absence of conflict. Journey through the Hebrew 'Shalom' (completeness) and the Greek 'Eirene' (tranquility).

name: Grace
title: Grace in Original Languages: Chen & Charis
description: Understand the 'unmerited favor' of God through the lens of Hebrew 'Chen' and Greek 'Charis'. See how these concepts transformed the early church.

name: Mercy
title: God's Mercy: Racham & Eleos
description: Explore the 'womb-like' compassion of the Hebrew 'Racham' and the active relief of the Greek 'Eleos'.

name: Faith
title: Faith & Faithfulness: Emunah & Pistis
description: Faith is not just belief, it's firm reliability. Study the 'rock-solid' Hebrew Emunah and the persuasive Greek Pistis.

name: Wisdom
title: Biblical Wisdom: Chokmah & Sophia
description: From the practical skill of Chokmah to the deep insight of Sophia, learn what it means to live wisely in God's world.

name: Power
title: Divine Power: Dunamis & Koach
description: Uncover the 'dynamite' power of Greek Dunamis and the inherent strength of Hebrew Koach.

name: Truth
title: Truth as Reality: Emet & Alētheia
description: Biblical truth is 'that which is firm' (Emet) and 'unveiling reality' (Aletheia). Explore the foundations of God's Word.
